# mypkgr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of mypkgr is to help you finding the love of your life. This is the package of Louis CAZCADE

## Installation

You can install the development version of mypkgr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("Loucami/mypkgr")
```
